plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange, too!
🌱 I grow under the ground
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with green leaves. Birds like to sit in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a big, brown trunk.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall
🏡 Squirrels sometimes live in me

plant.question: I am small and round and red or green. You can eat me!

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one of me!
🥧 People make pies out of me!
🐛 Sometimes worms live inside me

plant.question: I am yellow and sweet, and grow in a cob. You can eat me off the cob!

hints.text: 🌽 I am often eaten at barbecues
🚜 Farmers grow a lot of me.
🍿 I can be popped into a snack!

plant.question: I'm a big orange veggie that makes a spooky face at Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I get carved with a face and a candle inside
🥧 You can make pies out of me
🍁 I'm harvested in the fall

plant.question: I'm a yummy berry that's small and blue. You can pick me right off the bush!

hints.text: 🥣 I am often eaten with yogurt or in muffins
🇺🇸 I am blue like the US flag.
💜 I'm a similar colour as purple

plant.question: I am a flower that is often red, and smell very nice. You can give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a very popular gift for Valentines Day
🥀 I have thorns to protect myself
💐 People often put me in vases.

plant.question: I am green and leafy, and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can put lots of different toppings on me.
🥬 I can be dark green or light green.
🌱 Sometimes you can grow me in your garden

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown skin and white inside. You can mash me and eat me!

hints.text: 🍟 I am good fried
🥔 I am round and bumpy
🇺🇸 The state of Idaho is famous for me.

plant.question: I'm a big fruit that's green on the outside and pink on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing to eat on a hot summer day!
🏈 I am big and oval-shaped.
💦 I am mostly water

bug.question: I have spots and I fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my wings.
🔴 My spots are often red or orange.
🌸 I like to land on flowers.

bug.question: I wiggle and crawl, sometimes on leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat plants.
🐛 I can be green, brown or other colors.
🦋 I turn into a butterfly!

bug.question: I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz around.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🌼 I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am green or brown.
🎵 My sound is called a chirp.
🌿 I live in fields of grass.

bug.question: I build big hills with many tunnels. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
🏘️ I live in a colony.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.

bug.question: I float on the water and walk on it. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to be on ponds.
🛶 I have long legs that help me to stay on the surface.
🦗 I eat other insects.

bug.question: I come out at night and make a twinkling light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ My light helps me find a friend.
🌙 You see me when it's dark.
💡 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I have big eyes and fly at night, and I eat other bugs. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 Some people call me a mosquito hawk.
🌌 I am active when the stars are out.
🐛 My babies live underwater.

bug.question: I suck blood and can make you itchy. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I make a buzzing sound when flying near your ear.
🩸 I need blood to lay my eggs.
🖐️ People sometimes slap themselves when I'm around.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🍎 Charlotte was one of me.
